thread.section_title: American Frame americanframe.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Frame americanframe.com | www.americanframe.com
thread.title: Gloria
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Gloria

author: Gloria
title: Gloria
text: I was very impressed with the packaging and quality of the frame, everything protected beautifully, no scratches, nothing bent on a narrow metal frame! The instructions were a little blurry, the springs included were not mentioned and it took some time to realize they were for mounting without a backing board ... otherwise there was no place to put them. Had I known they were included I could have saved the expense of a backing board, but it made such a nice finish, it was well worth it. I definitely would use this company again and have already recommended it to friends.
